name: Brawl 'em up Prototype
description:
A prototype game project made as a school graduation project.

It is heavily inspired by "God Hand", a beat 'em up game from Capcom on the PS2.

You can fully customize the character's move list from the pause menu.

There is very limited gamepad support, although the menus currently require a mouse (I might change this in the future).

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: Surf Shimmy by Kevin MacLeod

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4448-surf-shimmy

License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Artist website: https://incompetech.com

(Oh yeah. If the music stops playing for some reason you can fix it by toggling the mute button in the pause menu off and on again)
